_header: A bishop woned beyond the sea / In Sicily the rich city
Subjects: legends; Theophilus, saint, legend of; Virgin Mary, miracles of
_description: The Legend of Theophilus in the Northern Homily Cycle — in couplets

BodSelSup52.First Lines:
A byschop wonyd in Acuntreþat hyȝt cicile be ȝond
                    þe see…
BodSelSup52.Last Lines:
…þat we may all at our ded dayCom to þat blys
                    þat lastes ay

BodAsh42.First Lines:
A bisschope woned beȝond þeseIn ciȝile þe riche
                    cite…
BodAsh42.Last Lines:
…Oure lorde iesu criste vs spedeTo do penaunce &
                    þider vs lede

Thompson,  Anne B.,
                        ed.  
             The Northern Homily
                    Cycle.

BodEngPoeta1.First Lines:
A Busschop woned in a CuntreÞat hihte Eisyli bi ȝonde
                    þe see…
BodEngPoeta1.Last Lines:
…Vre lord Ihesu crist vs spedeTo do penaunce and þider vs
                    lede Amen.

CULAdd8335.First Lines:
A bischope duelled in a contreÞat hight Cicyl biȝonde
                    þe cee…
CULAdd8335.Last Lines:
…Þat we may alle at oure ded dayCome to þat blisse
                    þat lastes ay

CULDd11.First Lines:
A Buschop woned in a cuntreþat highte Cicile be ȝond
                    þe se…
CULDd11.Last Lines:
…Wher is mekil myrþe & gameAmen sey we in goddis
                    name

nota narracionem bonam de Theophilo clerico (f.

CULGg531.First Lines:
A bysschopp wonde be ȝonde þe seeþat orryell hyght
                    þe ceteHe had a clerk þa theofle hyght…
CULGg531.Last Lines:
…And hys saule tyll heuen ȝodeTyll ihesu for to haue hys
                    mede…
CULGg531.Note: Ends imperfectly due to missing ff. 121-128.

BLHar2391.First Lines: A bichop wonde be ȝond þe seeIn ciȝile þe rych cete…

BLHar4196.First Lines: A bisschop wond biȝond þe seAnd cirile hight þe same cete…
BLHar4196.Last Lines: …And mildely þat it may so beSais all amen par charite

                    þe se…
